task.title: Modifying Payment Methods in the Community Portal
task.abstract: Authenticated portal users can control which payment methods to apply to both single and scheduled payments.The process for modifying payment methods is the same for staff users in the backend.

step.cmd: Log in to the Community Portal.
Click on the Payment Methods tab in side navbar.
Click on the applicable payment method to reveal modification options.

choices.choice: Edit-Users can update the Email, Phone, Billing Street, Billing City, State, Billing Postal Code, and Billing Country fields. The Card Holder Name is autopopulated from the New Payment Method modal and cannot be changed.
Delete-Clicking the Delete button verifies whether there is a scheduled payment associated with the selected payment method.

step.cmd: If there are no scheduled payments associated with the payment method, then a modal is returned verifying if the user is certain they want to delete the selected payment method.
step.info: Click Confirm to delete or Cancel for further review.

step.cmd: If there are scheduled payments associated with the payment method, then a modal is returned indicating that the user must select an alternate payment method prior to deletion.
Create a new payment method and click Delete on the payment method needing removal.
step.info: Select the new payment method from the picklist to assign to current scheduled payments and click Update Scheduled Payments.

taskbody.result: Payment methods are successfully updated and/or deleted.
